description:
“I actually had to start shaving my chest,” Tripp said. “If I don't it gets a little unruly!”
Tripp is a little shy and very quiet, so I was surprised he was so candid up front.
“My dad is pretty hairy, so being furry is in my future!”
His build has also been changing as well.
“I used to be super skinny,” he admitted.
“How long did it take you to get this big?”
“About three years,” he said, blushing. “I’ve been working out pretty hard.”
He seemed so shy about it! But the hard work is paying off. He’s got muscles bulging out everywhere!
title: Tripp
